items.title: UGREEN’s 5-port Nexode 48,000mAh power station with 300W charging speeds returns to $102 (Reg. up to $170), more
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, UGREEN is offering its Nexode 48,000mAh Portable Charger/Power Station back at $101.99 shipped. While this unit does carry a $170 MSRP, it’s been spending the last few months with continuous Prime-exclusive discounting that drops the costs between $120 and $108, with falls to lower rates peppered in once or so a month. Aside from the one-time $100 low that popped up in March, you’re otherwise looking at the best tracked price over the year, with 40% cut from its MSRP for a total of $68 in savings. Head below to learn more about this model and other charging solutions from the brand that are seeing discounts.

more…

items.summary: Threads officially debuts communities, dedicated spaces to have casual chats around a topic.

items.title: Perplexity’s Comet browser is now available to everyone for free
items.summary: After launching to subscribers willing to fork out hundreds of dollars a month this summer, Perplexity’s agentic AI browser Comet is now available to everyone for free. “The internet is better on Comet,” the company says, promising to remain free forever as it styles the browser as a serious challenger to Google’s Chrome.  Comet puts […]

items.title: Threads adds communities to help you find your people
items.summary: Threads is testing a new feature called communities, which will serve as dedicated spaces where you can find content or posts about your favorite topics. Starting today, you can explore different communities surrounding things like professional basketball, K-pop, books, TV shows, AI, and more. The feature is rolling out globally on the web and mobile. […]

items.title: This spacious 55-inch electric standing desk is a bargain at $79 shipped (Save 44%)
items.summary:
Marsail 55- by 24-inch Electric Standing Desk

Buy for $79 (Reg. $140)

What we love

The most common standing desk size we tend to come across spans 48 inches. This unit steps that up to 55 inches, giving you a bit more room to work. The depth of the surface is pretty standard, clocking in at 24 inches. I like that this unit has a built-in drawer and headphone hanger.

items.title: Putin vows quick response if Europe provokes Russia
items.summary: SOCHI, Russia (Reuters) -President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that Russia will quickly respond should Europe provoke Moscow, amid what he called a militarisation of the continent driven by hysteria. But he said he had no intention of attacking the U.S.-led NATO alliance. Read full story

items.title: SANDMARC brings its full-grain leather and metal case treatment to iPhone Air [Exclusive deal]
items.summary:
While somewhat divisive in terms of design, I personally love the SANDMARC iPhone 17 Pro/Pro Max metal and leather cases. In previous year’s, the brand’s unique metal cage camera array protection was only available for the pro-grade iPhone models, but with the launch of Apple’s new thin-as-Air handset, it has decided to expand its reach and deliver its all-new iPhone Air Pro Leather Case in black or brown – and we have an exclusive deal for you using code 9TO5TOYS at checkout.

items.title: It doesn’t get much better than $6 for a 7-card MagSafe wallet with stand (50% off)
items.summary:
ExtreLife 7-Card MagSafe Wallet with Stand

Buy for $6 (Reg. $12)

What we love

If your current MagSafe wallet has seen better days or you simply have yet to try out one of these, now is a solid time to cash in. At just $6 Prime shipped, this is an offer that’s just about as good as it gets. Despite the low price, this wallet sports enough room for “up to 7 cards” and has built-in stand functionality so you can prop up your iPhone as well.

While it carries a $750 MSRP, we’ve more often seen it keeping down near $600, especially at Amazon, with discounts over 2025 only having seen it drop its lowest to this very rate. items.title: Lenovo’s SteamOS Legion Go S gaming handhelds hit lowest prices today from $550
items.summary:
Alongside its now live Member Deals Days offers, Best Buy has currently listed Lenovo’s Legion Go S gaming handheld with SteamOS for $549.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene carrying a $500 earlier this year before jumping up by $100 with an official price hike. Today’s deal shaves $50 off its usual going rate, bringing it close to its original launch price and making it easier on your wallet. The SteamOS-powered variant of the Legion Go is rarely discounted, and it’s now matching the lowest price we first tracked for it in July. That puts it $50 below the base Xbox handheld that’s priced at $600. The more powerful 32GB RAM/1TB SSD model of the Legion Go S is also down at $779.99 shipped with a $50 discount on its $830 usual going rate. Head below for more details.

items.title: Amazon halts drone deliveries in Arizona after a pair crashed into a crane
items.summary: Amazon has paused drone deliveries in the West Valley Phoenix Metro Area after a pair of its MK30 drones crashed into a crane. They would normally go for $1,499 and $1,899 outside of discounts, which is honestly rare, as we usually see them discounted to $1,199 and $1,599, with falls lower during sale events. You’re looking at 40% and 32% markdowns here that are cutting $600 off both tags and landing costs at new all-time lows. items.title: This new 25W Qi2.2 wireless car charger with active cooling, 2-port 95W adapter, USB-C cable is down to $45 today
items.summary:
Courtesy of LISEN’s official Amazon storefront, you can now score the brand’s latest 25W Qi2.2 wireless car charger for $44.99 shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This is one of the newer models with a Qi2.2-certified wireless charging pad that recently hit the scene carrying a $60 price tag. Today’s deal delivers a 25% discount to shave $15 off its usual going rate. What makes this deal even better is that it comes with a 95W 2-port adapter and a braided USB-C cable – giving everything you need right out of the box for just $45, which is a pretty good value. These new Qi2.2 chargers are just starting to show up on the market now, and this is easily one of the more affordable options we’ve seen so far. Head below for more details.

items.title: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate price hikes are here, load your account up at the now discounted rate while you can
items.summary:
We are once again going to be doing something little bit different for today’s game post. Microsoft just announced sweeping changes to Xbox Game Pass – some good, some not so much – and one thing you’ll notice from our coverage is that Xbox Game Pass Ultimate is going up from $19.99 a month to $29.99 a month. Now might be a good time to load up your account and you can do so on Amazon where you will still find 1-month subs/extensions down at $19.99 and 3-months options at $59.99 a month. You can alternatively score 3-months of PC Game Pass at $35.99, which converts to 2-months of Ultimate (that’s $18 per month). There’s no telling how much longer this will work, or how much longer pricing will remain at $20/month via proper retailers – jump in while you can. There are some slightly sketchy sites out there with lower prices still, but many of them end up being more hassle than not much of the time. 

Xbox Game Pass is getting a major revamp, a major price hike, and some major upgrades
